item.title: Berkshires 2010
item.description: Some highlights during my visit to the Berkshires in the autumn of 2010: The Cascade (map): Trail head begins at the end of a very suburban road. Very limited street parking (think 2-3 spaces, depending on the skills of the driver). A short hike takes you over a nice wooden bridge as well as a fallen log-bridge. The waterfalls drops into a shallow pool at the trail. Mount Greylock summit (map): The foliage on Mount Greylock was past-peak when we were there.
